participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Caring and nurturing, loves to inspire her students. Enjoys spending time in nature and values her community.
participant_1.background: i work as a school teacher. i've a dogs. i enjoy gardening and walking outdoors. i am a woman. i attend church every week.

participant_2.name: David Smith
participant_2.personality: Hardworking and practical, values hands-on work and has a great sense of humor. Loves pets and enjoys sharing stories.
participant_2.background: my cats are very special to me. i am a construction worker. my dad taught me everything i know. i've 5cats. i enjoy building houses.
